RULE_NW004A.rule: Minimum area of NW is 0.140 um2

RULE_NW004B.rule: Minimum enclosed area of NW is 0.140 um2

RULE_ACT001.rule: Minimum vertical width of ACT layer is 48nm

RULE_ACT002.rule: Minimum Incremental vertical width of ACT layer is 40nm
RULE_ACT002.script:
ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = ACT ANGLE == 0 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES < 0.048 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.048 < 0.088 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.088 < 0.128 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.128 < 0.168 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.168 < 0.208 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.208 < 0.248 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.248 < 0.288 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.288 < 0.328 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.328 < 0.368 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.368 < 0.408 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.408 < 0.448 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.448 < 0.488 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.488 < 0.528 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.528 < 0.568 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.568 < 0.608 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.608 < 0.648 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.648 < 0.688 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.688 < 0.728 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.728 < 0.768 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.768 < 0.808 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.808 < 0.848 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.848 < 0.888 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.888 < 0.928 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.928 < 0.968 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.968 < 1.008

RULE_ACT004.rule: Minimum horizontal width of ACT is 96nm

RULE_ACT008A.rule: Minimum area of ACT is 0.004608 um2

RULE_ACT008B.rule: Minimum enclosed area of ACT is 0.004608 um2

RULE_ACT009.rule: Maximum distance between ACT forming a MOS device and ACT forming a bulk/substrate contact within the same well/substrate is 30um, to prevent latch up
RULE_ACT009.script:
ACT_MOS_DEV_A = GATEA AND ACT 
ACT_MOS_DEV_B = GATEB AND ACT 
 
ACT_CONTACT = AIL1 AND ACT 
NTAP = NW AND NIM 
AIL1_NTAP = ACT_CONTACT AND NTAP 
AIL1_PTAP = ACT_CONTACT AND PIM 
a = AIL1_NTAP SIZE BY 30 
ACT_MOS_DEV_A NOT INSIDE a 
ACT_MOS_DEV_B NOT INSIDE a 
b = AIL1_PTAP SIZE BY 30 
ACT_MOS_DEV_A NOT INSIDE b 
ACT_MOS_DEV_B NOT INSIDE b

RULE_GATE001A.rule: Exact horizontal width of GATE [A] is 20, 16 or 14 nm
RULE_GATE001A.script:
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges < 0.014 
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges > 0.014 < 0.016 
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges > 0.016 < 0.020 
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges > 0.020 < 0.200

RULE_GATE001B.rule: Exact horizontal width of GATE [B] is 20, 16 or 14 nm
RULE_GATE001B.script:
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges < 0.014 
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges > 0.014 < 0.016 
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges > 0.016 < 0.020 
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges > 0.020 < 0.200

RULE_GATE007A.rule: Minimum length of Gate A (vertical edge, gate C ignored) 200nm

RULE_GATE007B.rule: Minimum length of Gate B (vertical edge, gate C ignored) 200nm

RULE_GATE008A.rule: (gatea not gatec) maximum distance to neighbor shape on same design mask is 236nm
RULE_GATE008A.script:
GateAnotC = GATEA NOT GATEC 
x = SIZE GateAnotC BY 0.237 
GATEA NOT x

RULE_GATE008B.rule: (gateb not gatec) maximum distance to neighbor shape 236nm
RULE_GATE008B.script:
GateBnotC = GATEB NOT GATEC 
x = SIZE GateBnotC BY 0.237 
GATEB NOT x

RULE_GATE001AB.rule: Exact horizontal width of GATE [AB] is 20, 16 or 14 nm
RULE_GATE001AB.script:
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES < 0.014 
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.014 < 0.016 
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.016 < 0.020 
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.020 < 0.800

RULE_GATE007AB.rule: Minimum length of Gate AB (vertical edge, gate C ignored) 200nm

RULE_GATE008AB.rule: (gateAB not gatec) maximum distance to neighbor shape 236nm
RULE_GATE008AB.script:
GateABnotC = GATEAB NOT GATEC 
x = SIZE GateABnotC BY 0.237 
GATEAB NOT x

RULE_GATE001Ca.rule: Exact vertical width of GATEC is 32nm (1 is arbitrary large value) shape is oriented horizonally
RULE_GATE001Ca.script:
vert_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 90 
hor_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 0 
vert_edges_int = INT vert_edges < 1 
hor_edges_int = INT hor_edges < 1 
vert_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check1 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] < 0 
hor_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check2 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] > 0 
hor_edges_hor_pol = hor_polygons angle == 0 
INT hor_edges_hor_pol > 0 < 0.032 
INT hor_edges_hor_pol > 0.032 < 1

RULE_GATE002Ca.rule: Minimum horizontal length of GATEC is 128nm shape is oriented horizonatally
RULE_GATE002Ca.script:
vert_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 90 
hor_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 0 
vert_edges_int = INT vert_edges < 1 
hor_edges_int = INT hor_edges < 1 
vert_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check1 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] < 0 
hor_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check2 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] > 0 
vert_edges_hor_pol = hor_polygons angle == 90 
INT vert_edges_hor_pol < 0.128

RULE_GATE007C.rule: GATEC shape bottom or top must be aligned if distance < 192nm
RULE_GATE007C.script:
ext_region = EXT GATEC < 0.192 REGION 
angled_edges = ANGLE ext_region >0 <90 
angled_regions = ext_region WITH EDGE angled_edges 
GATEC INTERACT angled_regions

RULE_GIL001.rule: Minimum vertical width of GIL is 44nm

RULE_V0001a.rule: V0 is a square with 28nm edge length

RULE_M1002A.rule: One of two edges connected to the same vertex must have at least one of 56nm
RULE_M1002A.script:
x = CONVEX EDGE M1A ANGLE1==90 ANGLE2==90 WITH LENGTH < 0.056 
INT x < 0.001 ABUT

INT x < 0.001 ABUT

RULE_M1003A.rule: maximum length of M1A for wires with min width 28nm is 1.8um
RULE_M1003A.script:
wide_M1A = M1A with width <= 0.028 
d = INT wide_M1A <= 1 opposite 
d_p = dfm property wide_M1A d overlap abut also [EC1 = EC(d)] > 1.80 
copy d_p

RULE_MIS02A.rule: [ANTENNA] Ratio of Maximum Allowed GATE[A] Area to transistor Gate Area is 100:1
RULE_MIS02A.script: NET AREA RATIO GATEA GIL M1A MINT1A MINT2A MINT3A MINT4A MINT5A OVER N_GATE_A P_GATE_A > 100

RULE_MIS02B.rule: [ANTENNA] Ratio of Maximum Allowed GATE[B] Area to transistor Gate Area is 100:1
RULE_MIS02B.script: NET AREA RATIO GATEB GIL M1B MINT1B MINT2B MINT3B MINT4B MINT5B OVER N_GATE_B P_GATE_B > 100
